column1: # Note when I write flavor here: 1st person
column2: present tense is what I think I'm going with

column1: # Setting: Field outside location at dawn
# Work in location: Someone slips in dewy grass? Briefly blinded by sun?

column2: then vanilla normally hits you with this:

column1: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName] has accepted your terms. As dawn breaks
column2: you meet on a field just outside [Root.Location.GetName]. The mist still lies thick on the ground and the brilliance of the early morning sun is reflected in the shining steel of your weapons and armor. It is a good day to die.

column1: So we'll pillage that for our own lead up events. (Unlike the feast duel
Elements to include in duel: one participant circling so the sun is the other's eyes
column2: one participant screwing up by slipping in the dewy grass
column3: different options triggered by regent status
